title: Creating a Common Denominator
text: We must find the LCD in order to be able to add the fractions. The LCM of $$2m+6$$ and $$m^2+4m+3$$ is $$2\left(m+3\right) \left(m+1\right)$$

title: Rewriting Each Fraction
text: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get $$\frac{7\left(m+1\right)}{2\left(m+3\right) \left(m+1\right)}+\frac{8}{2\left(m+3\right) \left(m+1\right)}$$
